title: Format of the geometrical tetrahedron-volume description.
description:
Description of the volumes that form the object through which the sound waves travel.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

Nodes.description: The coordinates in space where the vertices/nodes of the mesh are located.

ElementIndices.description: Array of the id of the element and the four node indices which together make up a tetrahedron.

MediumName.description: The unique name of the medium.

Id.description: Identifier for this volume. This identifier should be unique amongst all other volumes.
